description:
If you share your boat with others, this adjustable paddle is a great option. With 20cm of adjustability, the Explorer FX Slider can grow or shrink with its user. The asymmetric blade and lightweight fibreglass shaft make it efficient for kayakers of all skill levels.

  • Strong fiberglass shaft
  • Hi-viz yellow nylon and fiberglass blade
  • Asymmetric blade has a dihedral angle for maximum efficiency
  • Center ferrule connection allows the paddle to adjust from 220-240cm, in 5cm increments, at the push of a button
  • Collapsible design is easy to pop in the car
name: Cannon Paddles Explorer FX Slider Paddle
